postcondition1: The mug is now in the sink.
knowrob: Mug means drinking vessel. Sink means plumbing fixture. Robot means man-made, machine that can do work or perform tasks automatically. Place means location, a thing that occupies space.
conceptnet: What is the relationship between "hold" and "place"?
Hold is the opposite of put. Put and place have similar meanings
What is the relationship between "hold" and "sink"?
Pass is the opposite of hold. Pass and sink have similar meanings
What is the relationship between "mug" and "sink"?
Mug is used for hold. Pass is the opposite of hold. Pass and sink have similar meanings

precondition: The fridge is open with a mug inside.
action: The robot closes the fridge.
postcondition: The fridge is now closed.
precondition0: The fridge is open in front of the robot.
action0: The robot closes the fridge.
postcondition0: The fridge is now closed.
precondition1: The fridge is open and a mug sits on its shelf
action1: The robot closes the fridge
postcondition1: The fridge is no longer open and takes up less space
knowrob: Fridge means appliance, used to store perishable food. Robot means man-made, machine that can do work or perform tasks automatically. Close means intrinsic state change event, object state from open to closed.
conceptnet: What is the relationship between "open" and "close"?
It cannot be both close and open
What is the relationship between "mug" and "close"?
Mug is used for hold. Lock is a specific way of doing hold. Lock is used for close

precondition: There is a full cup of water in front of the sink
action: The robot dumps the cup in the sink
postcondition: The cup is no longer filled with liquid.
precondition0: The robot is holding a mug of water in front of a sink.
action0: The water pours the water down the sink drain.
postcondition0: The robot is now holding an empty mug.
precondition1: The mug is full of liquid.
action1: The robot empties the mug.
postcondition1: The mug is now empty.
knowrob: Dump means move physical, sub-action of throwing something. Cup means drinking vessel. Robot means man-made, machine that can do work or perform tasks automatically. Sink means plumbing fixture.
conceptnet: What is the relationship between "sink" and "cup"?
Pass and sink have similar meanings. Pass is the opposite of hold. Cup is used for hold
What is the relationship between "cup" and "sink"?
Cup is used for hold. Pass is the opposite of hold. Pass and sink have similar meanings
What is the relationship between "full" and "dump"?
Sale is the opposite of full. Sell is a type of sale. Dump is a specific way of doing sell

precondition: The cellphone is on the bed.
action: The robot picks up the cellphone.
postcondition: The cellphone is picked up and closer to the robot.
precondition0: There is a cell phone on the bed and a credit card across the room.
action0: The robot picks up the cell phone.
postcondition0: The cell phone is no longer on the bed, it is now picked up, and it is now closer.
precondition1: There is a cellphone sitting on a bed
action1: The robot picks up the cellphone
postcondition1: The cellphone is now closer and is held
knowrob: Pick means separation event, sub-action of adding something. Cellphone means communication device, portable. Robot means man-made, machine that can do work or perform tasks automatically.
conceptnet: What is the relationship between "bed" and "pick"?
Bed is a specific way of doing put. Put is the opposite of pick
What is the relationship between "bed" and "robot"?
Bed is part of press. Press is a type of machine. Robot is a type of machine
What is the relationship between "bed" and "cellphone"?
Bed is used for hold. Hold is a type of cell. Cell and cellular telephone have similar meanings. Cellphone and cellular telephone have similar meanings

precondition: There is an unsliced loaf of bread sitting on the counter.
action: The robot slices the bread.
postcondition: The bread is now sliced, and its pieces are smaller, lighter and closer to the robot.
precondition0: There is a loaf of bread on a countertop
action0: The robot slices the bread
postcondition0: The bread is now sliced into smaller and lighter pieces, and is further away
precondition1: There's some bread on the counter top.
action1: The robot slices the bread.
postcondition1: Now the bread is sliced, it is closer and its pieces are smaller and lighter.
knowrob: Bread means food, made from flour. Slice means separation event. Robot means man-made, machine that can do work or perform tasks automatically.
conceptnet: What is the relationship between "counter" and "bread"?
Counter is a type of person. Person is made of water. Bread is the opposite of water
What is the relationship between "be" and "slice"?
Cut is a specific way of doing be. Slice is a specific way of doing cut
What is the relationship between "be" and "bread"?
Cover is a specific way of doing be. Bread is a specific way of doing cover

precondition: The robot stands in front of a clean pan.
action: The robot dirties the pan.
postcondition: The pan is now dirty.
precondition0: There is a clean pan on the countertop.
action0: The robot dirties the pan.
postcondition0: The pan is now dirty.
precondition1: The robot is in front of a pan lying on a countertop
action1: The robot dirties the pan
postcondition1: The pan is now dirty
knowrob: Pan means cooking device, metal. Robot means man-made, machine that can do work or perform tasks automatically. Dirty means unclean, not washed.
conceptnet: What is the relationship between "stand" and "robot"?
People can stand. Machine is the opposite of people. Robot is a type of machine
What is the relationship between "stand" and "robot"?
Human can stand. Machine is the opposite of human. Robot is a type of machine
What is the relationship between "clean" and "dirty"?
It cannot be both clean and dirty

precondition: The robot is holding the pan.
action: The robot sets the pan down on the countertop.
postcondition: The pan is on the countertop.
precondition0: The robot is holding a pan near a counter top with a knife on it.
action0: The robot puts the knife on the counter top.
postcondition0: The counter top now holds both the knife and pot, and the pot is no longer being held. The pan is also farther away.
precondition1: The robot is holding a pan while standing near a countertop.
action1: The robot places the pan on the countertop.
postcondition1: The pan is now further away and no longer held.
knowrob: Set means a collection of things. Pan means cooking device, metal. Robot means man-made, machine that can do work or perform tasks automatically. Countertop means horizontal work surface.
conceptnet: What is the relationship between "hold" and "set"?
Hold is the opposite of put. Set is a specific way of doing put
What is the relationship between "hold" and "set"?
Hold is the opposite of down. Set is similar to down
What is the relationship between "pan" and "set"?
Pan is a specific way of doing travel. Travel is the opposite of put. Set is a specific way of doing put

Assembly is a type of whole. Assembly is a type of machine. Robot is a type of machine

action1: The robot switches on the toaster

Bread is the opposite of meat. Cut is a type of meat. Cut is a specific way of doing switch
What is the relationship between "bread" and "switch"?
Bread is a specific way of doing cover. Cover is the opposite of back. Back is a specific way of doing switch
What is the relationship between "be" and "switch"?
Cut is a specific way of doing be. Cut is a specific way of doing switch
